user_query: I'm planning to organize a Beyblade tournament and I need a list of Beyblades to choose from. Fetch me a list of Beyblades with an offset of 10 and a limit of 50. Additionally, can you provide me with the airing schedule of shows for tomorrow?

TaskList.description: Fetch a list of Beyblades with an offset of 10 and a limit of 50.
Retrieve the airing schedule of shows for tomorrow.
